name: Mr Adams
text: Blaze is really good. Have a nice selection of meats and cheeses. The lemonade options are great. Haven't tried them but from what I observed, a customer who taste tested them was very impressed. I was impressed by the BlackBerry basil lemonade.  I think the process of the drinks are too high but overall it is a good establishment.

name: George Monroe
text: Pizza places, you either love them or hate them.  I have eaten pizzas throughout 25 different countries.  Blaze Pizza make their food on point.  It is a fun place for the family as each pie gets put together on an assembly line.  Design your own pie!

name: Dan Raymond
